Name: Serendipity Hotel
About the game: 「Serendipity Hotel」 You, who solved many cases in Serendipity Village, have been invited to the Serendipity Hotel VIP event. It is a 2D adventure mystery game where you solve the events that take place in a hotel. {STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/등장인물.jpg VIPs and hotel staff invited along with the detective. They are the breads to enjoy the event together, but they are the suspects in the incident at the Serendipity Hotel. Please solve the case through investigation!
